hero.title: Measure Your Fashion
hero.subtitle: Enable Vietnamese fashion brands to measure carbon footprints for 2026 export standards and manage a circular economy for garment waste.

userType.title: Who are you?
userType.b2cDesc: Consumers who want to contribute to circular economy

features.title: Powerful Features for Sustainable Fashion
features.subtitle: Everything you need to track, reduce, and report your carbon emissions

carbonProxy.title: Carbon Proxy Engine
carbonProxy.desc: Calculate CO2e for products with incomplete supply chain data using proxy emission factors.

circularHub.title: Circular Hub
circularHub.desc: Connect with recyclers and track the circular journey of your textile waste.

exportReady.title: Export Readiness
exportReady.desc: Score your compliance for EU, US, and JP export standards with actionable insights.

materialDb.title: Material Database
materialDb.desc: Access comprehensive emission factors for Cotton, Polyester, Denim, and 50+ other materials.

ngoPartner.title: NGO Partnerships
ngoPartner.desc: Direct connections to verified charities and recycling partners for maximum social impact.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.desc: AI-powered suggestions to reduce carbon tax and improve supplier sustainability.

transportCalc.title: Transport Calculation
transportCalc.desc: Automatic carbon calculation based on production origin and destination shipping routes.

carbonCredits.title: Carbon Credits
carbonCredits.desc: Convert recycled and donated items into verified carbon offsets for your ESG reports.

esgReports.title: ESG Reports
esgReports.desc: Export-ready documentation for audits, customs, and stakeholder communications.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes with our simple four-step process

step1.title: Connect Your Data
step1.desc: Import your product SKUs and supply chain information

step2.title: Calculate Emissions
step2.desc: Our engine computes accurate CO2e using industry factors

step3.title: Track & Reduce
step3.desc: Monitor your progress and identify reduction opportunities

step4.title: Report & Export
step4.desc: Generate compliant reports for international markets

stats.title: Making Real Impact
stats.subtitle: Measurable progress towards a sustainable fashion industry

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Carbon Strategy?
cta.subtitle: Join leading fashion brands measuring and reducing their environmental impact
cta.terms: By subscribing, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy

footer.desc: Empowering fashion brands to measure, reduce, and report their carbon footprint while building a circular economy.

calculator.title: Carbon Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Calculate CO2e emissions for your fashion products
calculator.description: Using proxy emission factors for incomplete supply chain data
calculator.instruction: Fill in the form and click calculate to see your emissions breakdown
calculator.proxyNote: Using proxy emission factors for incomplete supply chain data

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.starterDesc: For small businesses starting their sustainability journey
pricing.standardDesc: For growing brands with moderate tracking needs
pricing.exportDesc: For enterprises requiring full export compliance

auth.description: Sign in to access your dashboard
auth.termsNotice: By signing in, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy

validation.passwordLowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter

validation.passwordSpecial: Password must include at least one special character

messages.invalidLoginByType: No {accountType} account found with this email and password

checkEmailPage.title: Check your email

checkEmailPage.emailRequired: Please enter your email to resend the verification link.

checkEmailPage.googleHint: Use the same Google account after verification.
checkEmailPage.emailHint: After verification, sign in again to continue.

onboarding.title: Set Up Your Business
onboarding.subtitle: Tell us about your company to get started
onboarding.starterPlanDesc: Free trial to get you started
onboarding.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields
onboarding.companySaved: Company information has been saved successfully.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of your carbon tracking
dashboard.addProductDesc: Create a new product and calculate its carbon footprint
dashboard.trackShipmentDesc: Monitor shipping emissions for your orders
dashboard.exportReportDesc: Create compliance reports for export markets

weaveyChat.welcomeUser:
Hi! I'm Weavey, WeaveCarbon's AI assistant. I can help you:

? **Dashboard guidance**: Navigate and use features
? **Smart data input**: Describe data in natural language
? **Compliance alerts**: Monitor and optimize carbon emissions

What do you need help with?
weaveyChat.welcomeGuest:
Hi! I'm **Weavey**

I'm WeaveCarbon's sustainability AI assistant, ready to help you:

? Learn about **carbon footprint** and how to calculate it
? Answer questions about **green export regulations**
? Guide you through the **carbon calculation tools**

Ask me anything!

upload.dropzoneDescription: or click to select Excel (.xlsx) / CSV files

detail.noAddableProducts: No suitable products left to add to this batch.
detail.publishHint: Publishing will create one shipment for the whole batch.

errors.addProductFailed: Failed to add product to batch

dialog.title: Green Passport QR Code
dialog.description: This QR code acts as a product passport. Scan to see origin, carbon footprint, and export compliance.

help.customerDesc: Scan to see where the item is in the transport chain.
help.customsDesc: Verify origin, certifications, and US/EU compliance.

summary.draftNotice: Product is in Draft status - Carbon results are preliminary estimates

productDetail.draftWarning: Incomplete data - carbon results are preliminary estimates. Please supplement data for more accurate results.

carbonFootprint.title: Total Carbon Footprint

carbonFootprint.lowConfidence: Most data are estimates, need more input
carbonFootprint.methodologyNote: Calculated using LCA (Life Cycle Assessment) methodology, compliant with ISO 14067 and GHG Protocol.

compliance.title: Export Compliance Status

modal.notReadyError: Documentation not ready for report export. Please complete missing items.

notifications.documentRemoved: File removed. Document requirement remains and may appear as missing.

validation.invalidEmissionValue: Emission value must be a valid number >= 0.
validation.invalidExportVolume: Export volume must be a valid number >= 0.

recommendations.allCompleteDesc: No recommendations to implement. Documentation is export-ready.

client.fillInfoToContinue: Fill in the information below to continue

quantityNotice.title: About production quantity
quantityNotice.item1: The system calculates carbon for each product and the whole batch
quantityNotice.item2: SKU instances are used to group products by export batch
quantityNotice.item3: You do not need to enter each SKU manually; numbering is automatic

step1.weightPerUnitHelp: Average weight of one finished product
step1.quantityHelp: The system will automatically create SKU instances for batch tracking

step2.mainMaterialsTooltip: Select materials from the standard catalog or add a new one if not found.

proxy.title: Using proxy factors
proxy.description: Some materials have source marked as "Unknown" or are custom materials. The system will use industry average emission factors, which lowers confidence.

warnings.title: Material Notes (Step 2)
warnings.animalWelfare: Material "{material}" may require animal welfare certification for some markets.
warnings.metalHighImpact: Metal trims account for {percentage}% - high emission factor, consider reducing ratio or using recycled material.
warnings.customProxy: Custom material "{material}" uses proxy factor - carbon accuracy will decrease.
warnings.unknownOrigin: Material origin is unknown - the system will use industry average factors.
warnings.accessoryNoWeight: {count} accessories have no weight - this may reduce accuracy.

process.title: Manufacturing Process
process.subtitle: Select all applicable process steps
process.required: * Please select at least 1 manufacturing process

energy.title: Energy Sources
energy.subtitle: Select and allocate % for each source

additionalInfo.title: Additional Information
additionalInfo.manufacturingLocationPlaceholder: Ex: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

transport.title: Transport Modes
transport.subtitle: Add transport legs from origin to destination

locationPicker.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support geolocation
locationPicker.mapHint: Click the map or drag the marker to set an exact location

materialCombobox.addOtherHint: Cannot find a suitable material? Add a custom material

subtitle.input: Describe your material so the AI can suggest a matching classification
subtitle.results: Select a suggested material or create a new request

fields.name: Material name *
fields.namePlaceholder: Ex: Faux shearling fabric, zipper tape canvas...
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Add details about characteristics, origin, or usage...

proxy.title: Not in list - create new request
proxy.description: The system will use estimated factors. Your request can be reviewed and added to the catalog.

empty.title: No matching material found
empty.description: No material named "{name}" was found in the catalog. You can submit a request to add it.
empty.proxyDescription: The material will use an industry average estimate. Carbon result confidence will be lower.

proxy.materialNotFound: Material "{material}" is not in catalog - using proxy factor
proxy.unknownOrigin: Material origin is unknown - using regional proxy factor
proxy.noProcessInfo: No process information - using industry average factor
proxy.noEnergyInfo: No energy information - using grid electricity factor
proxy.transportEstimatedBySea: Transport estimated with sea freight mode
proxy.warning: Some materials use proxy estimates. Carbon result confidence is lower.
proxy.addMoreInfo: * Add more details to improve result accuracy
proxy.fullData: Sufficient data - result confidence is high

actions.title: Actions
actions.readyNote: ✓ Product is ready for carbon reporting
actions.needMoreDataNote: * More data is needed for complete reporting quality

productOverview.successDescription: The product has been added to the list. Below is the initial carbon footprint estimate.

formula.title: Formula:
formula.equation: CO₂e = Weight × Treatment Factor (material & region) × Energy Factor
formula.note: ⚠️ This is an initial estimate. Add more data to improve accuracy.
